data.name: Daggan
data.detailed_description:
Why Should You Survive Alone Against Villains ?
Create allies the sexy way to help you build your town and save the world.
But beware, for nights are dark and ancient evils will come for you.

Features

  • Have sex with your allies to create units
  • Gather resources to create buildings
  • Use the Skilltree to choose your strategy
  • Fight each night against waves of enemies
  • Explore a procedural map & underground dungeons
  • Original soundtrack
  • Random NPCs on the map to have sex and get rewards
  • Collect books to discover the lore and unlock content
  • Sexy statues to get passive skills

data.short_description: A sexy furry game where you reproduce to make big armies and build cities.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: - Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system - Other configuration and user environment as provided by default with the supported distribution (Kernel, Compositor, etc.) - Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Sex: 
Toon characters with pixel art animation of intercourses, heterosexual and homosexual.
Lore containing stories depicting sexual relationships.

Violence: 
Fighting against dead characters (ghosts, skeletons, etc) and stylized violence. 
Lore containing stories about discrimination, war and slavery.
